desc: Special agent Orson Fortune and his team of operatives recruit one of Hollywood's biggest movie stars to help them on an undercover mission when the sale of a deadly new weapons technology threatens to disrupt the world order.
Mystery of the mysterious death of Tjokro Kusumo. Tjokro Kusumo and Brotoseno were enemies who fought over the loji pusaka until the two of them harbored grudges against each other.
A newly rich and recently married man's comfortable life threatens to crumble when his infant child is possessed by an unholy spirit with a grudge.

Bahri, a young man who lives in Mekarsari Village. One day, Bahri realized that something was wrong in Mekarsari Village. Out of curiosity, he also found out what was really going on in the village where he lived.

Oscar, a has-been celebrity, is dying to get his name back up, when an opportunity finally appears albeit in form of a scandal: his love child from the past, Karin, suddenly shows up, with a baby of her own named Gempa.
Adagium grips you as hacker Alenda and soldier Arga unite to thwart Organization X's deadly presidential assassination. Can they unravel this chilling conspiracy in time?

Eyang Susana made a gift agreement with a demon named 'Jaran Penoleh'. The agreement made her have to prepare sacrifices in the form of 10 year old children to the devil. If can't, then Eyang Susana's life will be at stake.
After losing her job, a former movie theater usher does all she can to help revive the struggling small-town cinema where she used to work.

Hendra and Maya found a small child on their way home. The couple, who were not blessed with children, adopted the child and named it Alena. Since being adopted, Alena has had a positive impact on the family. Hendra, who was previously not very successful in his business, began to feel a drastic change toward success. Hendra and Maya's happiness was complete when they were blessed with a child they were looking forward to. However, irregularities begin to be felt. Everything turns into a disaster until it becomes life-threatening. The cause of the catastrophe turns out to be Alena, the daughter of the Devil Queen.
Clara, a wedding dress cosplayer who wants to become a flight attendant, lives in the same house with her best friend, Kinan, but has to separate when the two become pregnant with the same man.
A straight-A high schooler's life is turned upside down when her risqué fantasy blog about her crush is leaked to everyone at school.
In a village there is a girl who says goodbye to the mosque to pray maghrib to her father.

Hendri and Marini are successful in business. However, they don't pay enough attention to their children, Resika and Karin. Due to the economic crisis, their business goes backward until their lives undergo significant changes. Hendri turns into a gloomy person and enters a misleading path. Marini accidentally catches Hendri outside the house to go to a large tree in the corner of a vacant lot. Hendri secretly looks for shortcuts to regain his wealth: allying with the devil. The business is recovering. Since then, Resika began to realize that something strange is happening to her sister, Karin.

tittle: Jalan yang Jauh, Jangan Lupa Pulang
desc: Studying abroad in London, Aurora struggles with her relationships while away from her family in this sequel to One Day We'll Talk About Today.

Asti and Umar, the employees of a Statistics Office, are assigned to update data in a remote village in a district in Sulawesi. Umar and Asti do not realize that the place where they are taking shelter is the house of the man who made a deal with the devil to become rich instantly. Difficult road access and long distances between houses become obstacles, so they are forced to live in the village for quite a long time. One day, Umar meets Rajeng, and they fall in love. Unknowingly, Rajeng entered into an agreement with her adoptive parents as the successor to the black magic they had. The arrival of Asti and Umar exposes various guises of the local villagers. Asti and Umar's lives begin to feel threatened.
Adam, an architect who has lived a traumatic life for the past 2 years. He was traumatized by seeing his family being killed in front of his own eyes.
Based on real events, four professional bank robbers and ATM machine breakers from Russia go on rampage in Bali. The Balinese police force are in hot pursuit to catch the robbers.
Three women in a small village conceal dark secrets, including unholy alliances and a mysterious ingredient used in a popular curry restaurant.
Love slowly grows when the new girl in school meets an unassuming boy from a run-down part of town, but her disapproving father stops them at every turn.
An adventure of 5 friends, Kiko, Poli, Lola, Tingting and Patino to help a royal princess find five lost pearls in order to restore a broken kingdom.
4 people intend to commit suicide together by blowing themselves up using a large ball of fireworks.
Seeking shelter in a forgotten part of town, travelers get trapped inside a cursed motel - while its host forces them to face its darkest terrors.
Seno really loves his wife Alya and her daughter Reva. However, there is a big secret that must be covered by him in the household.

Haruni screams in pain of being possessed by a devil. Besides being in pain, she also tends to hurt herself. Haruni's sister, Hanum, has glaucoma. Dr. Ahmad, who is treating Hanum, hears Haruni's story. He then treats Haruni during the night of the recitation. Haruni's body spasms violently, manage to release all the bonds on her body and jumps into the window of the house's second floor. Ahmad suspects that Haruni has a connection with a suicide case. The body of the person who killed himself was also possessed by the demon flowing in Haruni's blood. Ahmad and a police friend help Haruni's problems, looking for data on the man who had committed suicide and expelling the evil spirit from Haruni's body.
Andri and Wati are a young couple who are willing to do anything for money, even supernatural things like 'praying' at a sacred grave.
Being the victim of a wrong target, Sasa dies in a car accident. Sasa's spirit, who is restless, returns home, but Sasa does not yet know that she is dead.
Riani, a teenager who is forced to reveal her hidden powers when several mysterious cases occur and turn the city into chaos.

On the verge of being broke, a sock shop owner enters a video contest where she has to date twelve men with different zodiac signs and prove that love compatibility based on zodiac sign is just a myth.

Amanda is a transfer student, she lives in the dormitory so she can focus on taking part in the biology olympiad. There he met Adam and his gang, new friends who helped him from being tormented by a gang of bully students. The closeness of Amanda and Geng Adam triggers a cynical reaction from Davin, who is a top student. Davin is still depressed over the departure of his best friend, Kelly, who committed suicide because of her viral erotic video. He suspects Geng Adam of being the one who spread the video. Slowly, Kelly's ghost comes to haunt them via video chat terror, asking for justice for the mystery of her death.
Ayu, dances every day to earn a living and add to school fees. Little Agus lives by picking pockets. And, little Laras works as an umbrella motorcycle taxi and sells it.

Sri is tasked to do a cleansing ritual for Dela Atmojo, an unconscious girl who is suffering from 1000 days-hex. The terror begins when her friend neglects to finish the ritual. Failing until the 1000th day will result in their demise.
After his father was beheaded by ninjas in Banyuwangi '98, Rahayu was traumatized to the point where he found it difficult to concentrate on his prayers due to interference from the khanzab.
27 Years On. The story of Jin and Jun will start again. Will this time last forever?

Adam has long been captivated by Susan's beauty, the beautiful widow who owns the tea factory where he works. Unfortunately, not only she didn't feel the same way, but Susan insulted and humiliated him. Adam is determined to avenge his heartache and carried out the ancient ritual he learned from his late father Ki Suryo. He has to dig graves using a spoon with his mouth for days to get 'pelet tali pocong'. It didn't take long for Susan to fall into Adam's arms along with all her factory and assets. The residents were afraid to leave the house because of the pocong's terror that often appears in their village. Ustadz Bahri suspected Adam as the culprit who allied with the 'pocong'. Adam planned to take Ustadz Bahri's life who also became an obstacle to his relationship with Anissa, Ustadz Bahri's daughter. Anissa flatly rejected Adam's love, and he intended to kill Anissa with his own hands. Will Adam succeed? Or will he die horribly due to his own actions.
This sweeping biopic captures the life of renowned Muslim scholar Buya Hamka, from his humble West Sumatra origins to his political achievements.
A full peek to a day in the life of Jonny and Franky, two best friends who got cornered into doing three missions out of their work principle and value, in order to retire from their job as hitmen.
A greedy husband and wife use a monkey claw amulet given by a shaman so they can get rich quickly.
After a failed suicide attempt, Kresna is pursued by four ghosts who will only leave him alone if he fulfills their requests, leading him to find a new meaning in life and love for Nurse Linda.
Bagas returns to his hometown to revive religious activities and social norms but is persecuted and killed by Wirya and his men, only to come back to life and haunt them with his bike bell.

Based on the period in Malaysian Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim's life when he became Finance Minister from 1991 until he was fired from the Cabinet in 1998, which sparked a period of political uprising known as the Malaysian reformasi.
Alina Suhita's unwavering determination is tested as she navigates the storms of her tumultuous marriage in pursuit of love.

Cahya gets a job as a maid working in an isolated old mansion. Pregnant and a recent widow, she is desperate to reconnect with her husband, opening a doorway to the spirit world. And in doing so, inadvertently awakens the tormented ghosts of her current employer, the previous maids.
A nurse experiences supernatural terror while caring for an elderly patient and seeks help from a friend to uncover a dark ritual.
A woman finds her true love in Bali but gets caught in a dilemma between choosing her fiancé or following her heart.
Ella struggles with a long-distance relationship after her lover leaves abruptly, facing parental pressure, jealousy, and inner turmoil.
After her sister's death, a woman goes to Makassar to uncover her father's secret legacy house and encounters a mysterious woman guarding the well-maintained property.

A guilt-ridden young woman who moves to Jogja to escape the memory of her brother meets a man with autism and with the help of a new friend, sets out to make his dream of playing with his idol a reality.

After a renowned horror actress, Dara Lazuardi, encounters a haunted doll resembling her deceased daughter, she becomes convinced of its connection to her child's spirit, leading her into a spiral of madness as others try to intervene.

Anton's marriage to Yuni, his wife's friend, triggers a series of supernatural terrors and conflicts, leaving Nuri disappointed and Yuni's mother fearing for the safety of her child and future grandchildren.
Three privileged men in their twenties who embark on a road trip to Surabaya to have their first sexual experience.

Juwita, a heavily overweight girl, almost gave up on her life after being hit by the ninth times heartbreak. Hope comes when she has a chance of transforming into Angel, a super gorgeous, golden-voiced girl.
Five friends encounter terrifying demons and unravel the mysteries of an old villa during their vacation in Bromo, leading to conflicts and revelations about the dark secrets of its past.
A former lead vocalist of a highly acclaimed band tries to regain his popularity in the music industry, which has evolved significantly since his prime.
Angku Wan, a retired teacher who won a raffle prize from a soap company. With those billions, Angku Wan intends to build a village for the common good.
Gala, devastated by a sudden breakup, seeks healing but finds herself falling for Aiman, only to realize that he is not the solution to her broken heart.
In their quest to prove infidelity and ensure a successful marriage, Almond and Takdir embark on a thrilling adventure as detectives, uncovering cases of betrayal and deception.
This film tells the story of the life of a young man who has a desire to change and at one point when he experiences a setback in himself, he becomes desperate.
Dita, a graphic designer torn between the holographic presence of her deceased love Ed and her current relationship with Ifan, must choose between the past and the present.
A single mother from Bromo does not dare to pursue her dream and carry out her passion, which is writing, because she thinks that her only duty is to make her daughter's dream come true.

tittle: Hari Ini Akan Kita Ceritakan Nanti
desc: The lives of Narendra and Ajeng intersect for the first time as past and present come together in this prequel to One Day We'll Talk About Today.
Three children with stifled dreams meet a mentor who helps them overcome societal expectations and pursue their true passions.
The opening day of Tea Shop Yang Bercerita will be the day that will change the story of Arissa's friendship with Kania and Arissa-Ezra's imperfect love.

The story revolves around a new female college student in a dormitory filled with mysterious occurrences due to the awakening of a demon through an incantation and curse that still holds a connection to her own past.
Bramanto Putra, an archaeology student, found an ancient notebook on Onrust Island that had been buried for 300 years.
Three distinct settings uniquely portray three separate stories of old friends reunited, a young man's reckless ambition, and love found amidst tragedy.
Amidst gang rivalries, Galaksi's unexpected love for Kejora sparks empathy, triggering conflicts that intertwine Paskibra and motorcycle gangs Ravispa and Avegar.
Suzzanna was bewitched on a Kliwon Friday night. She came back for revenge, in the form of Sundel Bolong.
Boy, a perfect student, faces heartbreak and confusion when his beloved girlfriend disappears, leading to a new romance that is threatened by the return of his ex-girlfriend.

tittle: Dear Jo: Almost is Never Enough
desc: After the tragic death of Maura, Ella and Joshua's lives are shattered as Ella carries Maura's child, navigating grief, parenthood, and unexpected challenges.
After her fiancé's ship sinks, Tenri falls into depression but eventually accepts a new proposal, only for complications to arise when her lost fiancé is found.
Amidst a mountain climbing trip, Rana goes missing, but miraculously returns home, causing a conflict between her mother's belief in her survival and the superstitious extended family.
Ayu searches for a cure to save her dying sister Laras, who is a sex worker cursed by a magical amulet, while they face escalating terrors in their ancestral village.
Jonathan's family moves into a haunted apartment after facing financial ruin, where they experience terrifying paranormal activities endangering their lives.
Galih, a successful solo singer, meets Marlina, a girl resembling his past love Ratna, as they navigate their feelings and past connections.
A woman who has become a ghost experiences regret and seeks her friend's help in the human world to assist her in resolving her unfinished business with her boyfriend.
Aqilla discovers her long-lost son, Baskara, but faces a moral dilemma as he has been raised by another couple; a heartfelt struggle ensues.
Nadia, the sole survivor of her family's tragic fate, grapples with the looming threat of her father's sacrifice as she faces a life on the edge.
Sadam, a true adventurer, reunites with his brave childhood friend, Sherina, when she embarks on a journalistic adventure.
Hao, with retrocognition, saves Sari from the wrath of Pocong Gundul, a malevolent sorcerer in ghost form, risking his life to stop its evil plans.
Dina's escape from loneliness into an addictive 'sleep call' relationship turns deadly as unexplained deaths emerge.

tittle: Aku Tahu Kapan Kamu Mati: Desa Bunuh Diri
desc: Siena and her friends uncover a mystery when deaths occur without warning, leading them to Remetuk Village and a dark curse.
A troubled young man trapped in a time loop relives the day his mother died, seeking redemption with the help of friends.
Three friends with commitment issues help panic-stricken Ali, who's afraid of women, find love while navigating their own romantic struggles.
A gravedigger and students breaking a taboo by whistling at night face a horde of pocong apparitions.
A peaceful school exam day turns into a nightmare when a terrifying dark force possesses and terrorizes high-achieving students, causing mass hysteria and death.

Zora has been described as an indigo since young, making her life always haunted and targeted by supernatural beings. Alongside her younger sister, who is also an indigo, they strive to overcome their fear of these unseen attacks.

Imam falls in love with Naira, a violinist who owns a shelter for street children. Imam called her Humaira like the Prophet Muhammad's nickname for Siti Aisyah. Mamak disapproves of the relationship because Naira works at a nightclub.

Gaspar, a detective works on a mass slaughter case involves government where he encounters a informant who gives hint towards disappearance of his childhood friend Kirana, which points him towards Wan Ali, a human-trafficking crook.

When Shita, the lead singer of a major band goes missing, the band goes on a search, finding out that Shita is in Saranjana, a supernatural city, and to bring him back they must find a portal through an adventure of mystical events.

Orpa's husband just passed away and left her with three daughters. Orpa has to face the constant discrimination and centuries-old tradition that always left the women as a second-class gender in the society and the victim of violence.
When Mel and Satya plans to get married. Three months before the wedding, Mel suddenly has a anxiety on whether he really wants Satya in his future.
Fraya falls in love with the mysterious playboy Elmar in the Netherlands, but must keep her feelings a secret due to her friend Tya's affection for him, all while uncovering Elmar's hidden secrets.

Ali is a young boy living in the Blok M community running music events. His life is mostly in the streets. Although he is considered a delinquent, his kindness toward others makes him into a kind of Robin Hood character.
A young woman who uses black magic to threaten her cousin's wife.

Panggonan Wingit itself means a very sacred and haunted place, which is in accordance with the poster for this film. Panggonan Wingit tells the story of the main character played by Luna Maya who inherits a hotel from her father. In a Panggonan Wingit poster, a bloody door is shown in a dark alley with minimal lighting. Panggonan Wingit will present a story with the background of a haunted and sacred place, and the possibility of it being connected to the supernatural and the spiritual world. When his father died and inherited the hotel, something related to the supernatural was revealed. The filming of Panggonan Wingit itself was carried out at a hotel in the Rinjani area, Semarang which had been transformed into Panggonan Wingit.
A pair of twins come to a remote village to find out the cause of their father's strange death, but they end up trapped in a dangerous village full of terror.
Nadzira Shafa's journey deciding to migrate and meet her love, Ameer Azzikra. Trials came in his married life, until fate separated them.

A warm and perfect family. The family is Mr Radit, mother Kala, and their son, Bima. However, this family had to face the fact that their mother died due to suspected suicide. Since then, the family no longer feels perfect, and e emergence of terror haunts the family, especially their children.
Akram has to fight hard to fulfill Sika's father's expectations. She faced exorbitant dowry demands, demands that were difficult to meet.

tittle: Jatuh Cinta Seperti di Film Film
desc: Bagus, a screenwriter who is grieving when his wife dies, reunites with his old friend, Hana. Now, he wants to try to fall in love again, but just like in the films he has written before.
The brothers' struggle to find money to save the family from debt, without the mother's knowledge.
After a viral altercation, Prani, a guidance counselor, faces backlash endangering her career and family.
